website_summaries.verdict: Anyone with a budding musical prodigy in the house will love this popular baby mat, courtesy of one of the reigning toy-making brands.
pros: Babies can lie down and play with the piano keys and hanging toys
Older kids can carry around detachable keyboard
Can choose between short-play tunes and longer ones, up to 15 minutes
Mirror can be placed wherever with the Velcro strap
cons: Some feel that added lights would enhance the music
If not assembled properly, baby can kick or pull it down easily

customer_reviews.title: A must-have for infants
customer_reviews.text: My baby has always been a great kicker but didn’t know what to do with her hands until we bought this. She is now reaching and grasping things and still kicking of course! She loves this!
customer_reviews.author: LScott

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun even for a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been on her mat since she was 4 weeks! Each week she gets more and more from her mat and has really enjoyed playing until she falls asleep right on her mat. Now she's 7 weeks and loves kicking the piano keys and hitting the hanging toys! My only complaint is the mirror is too small and blurry. I added a different one that is larger and more clear which made a huge difference. All in all this is one toy that travels with us everywhere we go!
customer_reviews.author: PShell_811

customer_reviews.title: Good fun toy for baby
customer_reviews.text: My daughter (4 months) loves this as she has figured out how to kick the piano. The toy definitely keeps her busy. She loves the hanging toys and the mirror. I think the mat can be a little thicker and padded though.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great at keeping my son entertained
customer_reviews.text: I recommend the piano gym to all new moms. My son still plays with it and he is almost 7 months old. This is one of the few items that has kept his interest and gives me five minutes to get other things done. The only complaint I have is that it's a bit narrow so once they start rolling there isn't much room for them to move around. Not a huge issue though. I love that he can kick and hear songs or just keys as well.
customer_reviews.author: Clare

customer_reviews.title: I just love this Kick and Play Piano and so do my ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love this Kick and Play Piano and so do my twins! They love the little toys attached and the mirror and kick away for hours. the only thing keeping it from being 5 stars ins there is no way to connect the mat to the plastic sides and leaves a tiny space between on each side. not a big issue at all just with wiggling 5 month olds it eventually gets moved and bunched down by the piano and has to be pulled back up
customer_reviews.author: Annette B

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 10 week old daughter. She loves playing the piano with her feet and will even kick with both of her feet to play 2 different notes at the same time. This was a good buy and really easy to set up. The music is not annoying either so you can listen to it in the background when you're doing things around the room while she's playing
customer_reviews.author: lusciousleelee

customer_reviews.title: Grows with baby and changes to her learning levels
customer_reviews.text: I love it and so does the baby, it has grown with her
customer_reviews.author: Casie

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure she will get good use of it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby girl granddaughter who is expected to arrive August 2017. I'm sure she will get good use of it!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Roach

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: We've had the kick and play piano play mat since late March, it's now mid July and my daughter has not grown tired of it. This toy had taught her to kick with force, which had strengthened her legs immensely and to reach. It is a great starter toy for developing early motor skills. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars because my daughter loved it but the black on the piano keys started coming off not too long after purchasing. Other than that we loved it.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Honestly, I was kind of shocked when I opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I was kind of shocked when I opened the big bulky brown box that the pieces were just laying in there without another plastic wrapper at least, but colors seem vibrant and new.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend...
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with the way this showed up. In a Fisher Price box all dented up. It looks like it has been either used and returned or returned by a previous customer and it never was put back in its original packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I have ever imagined
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as I have ever imagined. Maybe my girl is out of the age lying on it. But the music keyboard is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: This was bought for my granddaughter who started "kicking" her feet at 3 months old. She loves this toy! It's not flimsy and she tugs on the toys they won't break off
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: My favorite little gym for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My favorite little gym for my daughter. Definitely love the keyboard part for when she kicks. It is too cute.
customer_reviews.author: cassidy loomis

customer_reviews.title: Good build and quality
customer_reviews.text: My niece loved this one, now she outgrew this one, but she loved it, the quality was good and would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Pradeep Adapa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My fourth month old loves to kick and play in this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Becca B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I shipped it straight to my niece for her 6 months old baby girl. It comes with batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Dalitza

customer_reviews.title: One of my 5 month daughter favorite toys! Shes loves to kick the piano part
customer_reviews.text: One of my 5 month daughter favorite toys! Shes loves to kick the piano part, and loves the mirror to watch herself!
customer_reviews.author: nicole t coovert

customer_reviews.title: This is a great playmat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great playmat!!! Totally loved by my baby at 3-5 months and still loves it. The best part is you can change it to a sit and play piano when they are bigger and able to sit up. Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for a mom to be
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift and the baby loves this! Keeps the baby entertained and helps with tummy time! Great purchase for a mom to be!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: really good! my baby play it since 2 mounth till ...
customer_reviews.text: really good !my baby play it since 2 mounth till 5.5mounth
customer_reviews.author: Momo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to assemble, and the baby loves it. What's there else to say...
customer_reviews.author: Maya's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great gym for my baby, she can kick the piano and hit the toys and the mirror is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanwill

customer_reviews.title: Omg i love this item
customer_reviews.text: Omg i love this item....easy to assemble and it comes with batteries included can't wait for my daughter to be born and use this
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its a fun cute toy and works well. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable. Fun. What is there not to like? We use this everyday.
customer_reviews.author: MommaM

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my infant busy and happy. I love how she interacts with the hanging ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my infant busy and happy. I love how she interacts with the hanging objects and talks to them lol
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my baby love it, and i can do other things when she play it. it's so great to me.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I have gotten for my daughter so far. She absloutly loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter loves her playmat! It was well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: BethPL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy! My daughter loves it and her happy feet too lol ;)
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this color, and my daughter loves to play with it very much!

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Kick 'n Play Piano Gym Pink
product_meta.description: Baby kicks. Music plays. And that's just the beginning of this sweetly styled, oh-so-pink gym. Movable toys on the overhead gym encourage baby to bat and grasp. Move the arch down for tummy-time play, or let baby sit and entertain you with a piano concert. And now with a removable piano, you can take the musical fun wherever you and baby go.
feature_bullets: Ships in certified Frustration Free Packaging
Four ways to play: Lay and play, tummy time, sit and play, and take along
Music rewards baby as they kicks the piano keys
5 busy activity toys and a large mirror
Short or long play music up to 15 minutes

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars66 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
